statements: UPDATE wildlife_tracking SET location = ST_Point(0, 0), timestamp = '2022-07-01 10:00:00' WHERE animal_id = '65a51938-c6d4-4d74-a33a-ecf30dcff00e';

UPDATE WildlifePopulations SET Species = 'Tiger', Latitude = 28.7041, Longitude = 77.1025 WHERE ID = 1;
UPDATE MovementPatterns SET Speed = 10.5, MovementType = 'Migration' WHERE ID = 1;
UPDATE WildlifePopulations SET Species = 'Elephant', Latitude = -24.58749618, Longitude = 31.21777213 WHERE ID = 1;
UPDATE MovementPatterns SET Speed = 10.00, Direction = 'North' WHERE PopulationID = 2;

UPDATE species SET species_name='Updated Species Name' WHERE species_id=1;
UPDATE tracking_devices SET device_type='GPS Tracker' WHERE device_id=2;
